author: ate
msg: - cleanup and standardizing master pom and other pom configurations
- adding missing license headers to pom files (only)
- renaming RELEASE NOTES -> RELEASE_NOTES (master pom project)
- adding LICENSE and DISCLAIMER to main project root
- removing now redundant L&N related resource files

author: minfrin
msg: Expression parser: Add the ability to base64 encode and base64 decode

author: peter_firmstone
msg: Numerous refactorings and updates, including delayed starting of services with com.sun.jini.start.Starter until after construction is complete, Outrigger now utilises delayed starting for JMM compliant safe construction.

RemoteEvents and some subclasses are now immutable, protected fields with existing get methods have been made private, these could remain protected and be final to remain compatible, will change back to protected if requested.

author: elecharny
msg: o Made the getOffset() method public to be able to use it from the RM
o Fixed the usage of nbElems for Node : it's a negative value, we have to make it >0 to create the arrays

author: ieugen
msg: * thanks Rustam Gupta for the MIME4J-222 patch
